alert.note: Alert for Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Paulding, northeastern Haralson and southeastern Polk Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Antioch, or 7 miles southeast of Cedartown, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Rockmart, Yorkville, Fish Creek, Draketown, Felton, Eubank Lake, Antioch and Van Wert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
